Prerequisites

CON 13, @UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.peeewBkpYgDt0ybt]{Defensive Martial Arts}

Benefit

The character gains 4/Bludgeoning DR.

@UUID[Compendium.opsandtactics.core-rulebook.Item.UXyLrGRJkyliwVU2]{Improved Defensive Martial Arts}

Special

This DR is added to the original feat.
